mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DWS_PRODUCT_LINE_YIELD_FIDS ( FACTORY, PERIODDATE, PRODUCTID, OUTPUT_GLS_QTY, SCRAP_GLS_QTY, INPUT_PNL_QTY, OUTPUT_PNL_QTY, INTERFACE_TIME, PRODUCTTYPE ) VALUES ( #{FACTORY,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{PERIODDATE,jdbcType=DATE}, #{PRODUCTID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{OUTPUT_GLS_QTY,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{SCRAP_GLS_QTY,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{INPUT_PNL_QTY,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{OUTPUT_PNL_QTY,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, sysdate, #{PRODUCTTYPE,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
